details.name: Hisn al-Muslim
details.chapter: When feeling some pain in the body

data.arabic: ضَعْ يَدَكَ عَلَى الَّذِي تَألَّمَ مِنْ جَسَدِكَ وَقُلْ: "بِسْمِ اللَّهِ" ثَلاَثاً، وَقُلْ سَبْعَ مَرَّاتٍ: "أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ وَقُدْرَتِهِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا أَجِدُ وَأُحَاذِرُ"
data.meaning:
Put your hand on the place where you feel pain and say:
Bismillāh (three times).
Then say seven times:
A`ūdhu billāhi wa qudratihi min sharri mā ajidu wa uḥādhir.
Put your hand on the place where you feel pain and say: With the Name of Allah (three times). Then say seven times: I seek refuge in Allah and in His Power from the evil of what I find and of what I guard against.
